name: Lost at Birth
description:
Lost at Birth will tell the story of a rather ordinary guy.
Stable job, nice house, comfortable routine, married, with no kids… that he knows of.

In short, his life is pleasantly boring.

To spice things up he has some fun on the side that his wife doesn't need to know about. Then things turn upside-down when a young woman comes into his life…with a birth certificate.


This is a choice-driven adult Visual Novel featuring:

-Over 1300 static images and several animated scenes
-2-3 hours of game
-Top notch graphic fidelity and realism.
-A realistic and interesting story that explores complex relationships.
-Choose how the mc acts selecting your choices.
-Music that adjust to the scene's mood.
-Sound effects.
-Episodes 1-6


Pursue or change your relationship with the new people in your life.


Try to stop your sex addiction and save your marriage.


Forget about all the people in your past and fall into a life of sex and hedonism.
